Ryan Chitwood is a Quantitative Analyst at [Synovus](https://www.synovus.com/). Before that he was the Research & Data Analyst at [PAEA](https://paeaonline.org/). [plotthedata](https://plotthedata.com/) is his personal website and portfolio. Each post is a recreation of a past project he worked on. In his spare time, Ryan enjoys playing basketball and hanging out with his family.
